Comment.Content: Thank you for mentioning NArrange. By default, NArrange will move using statements into namespaces to conform to StyleCop rules. However, you can disable this behavior by removing the following from your XML configuration file: <Usings MoveTo="Namespace" /> This behavior can also be changed using the configuration editor tool under the Formatting -> Using Directives section. You may want to make a backup copy of the configuration file first or save to a new configuration file and supply it to NArrange using the /c command-line arg. As for the encoding issue you're seeing. NArrange does its best to detect the file encoding, but it is not 100% accurate. Though, it is possible to force NArrange to use a particular encoding. For more information on this, refer to the NArrange Documentation. Thanks again, James
